message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering holds immense value for us at $1200000, reflecting its exceptional quality and benefits. Considering its significance, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special price tailored for you. We propose to sell it to you for $1150000. This price not only ensures a substantial return for us but also presents an excellent value proposition for you, given its worth to you stands at $1200000. We believe this deal offers mutual benefits and look forward to discussing how we can finalize this transaction.
